title: Game wont open
body:
Whenever I try to launch the game it pops up a screen that says: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working

And that's it. How do I fix this?

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are usually a result of League not operating with the proper administrative privileges it requires. Since League interacts with software packages that reside *outside* of the League folder, you'll need to [assign it the right system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).

Let me know if that resolved this issue.
Please help, reinstalling it didn't do anything either.
